text: Sondu is a small town border town in Kenya's Kisumu County and Kericho County. It borders Homabay County to the south with river Sondu-Miriu acting as a boundary to the south. It also acts as a transport hub between Kericho, Kisumu and Kisii towns as the Kisumu-Kisii highway passing through it. == References == Category:Populated places in Nyanza Province
title: Sondu
